message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its worth, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,350,000. I believe the product has great value, but I'd like to negotiate further to find a mutually beneficial price.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer and understand your perspective.  I'm still confident this product offers you significant value at $1,500,000.  To meet you closer, I'm willing to come down to $1,380,000. This feels like a fair compromise considering the product's potential.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. I'd like to propose $1,375,000 as a new price for the product.
